text: Balunah satya tomadera palanakartara paksa theke agata. Ata'eba, yara iccha, bisbasa sthapana karuka ebam yara iccha aman'ya karuka. Ami jalemadera jan'ye agni prastuta kare rekhechi, yara bestani tadera ke paribestana kare thakabe. Yadi tara paniya prarthana kare, tabe pumjera n'yaya paniya deya habe ya tadera mukhamandala dagdha karabe. Kata nikrsta paniya ebam khuba'i manda asraya.
